info.title: Time Tracker Tool
info.description:
# Introduction
This API defines how the employees tracking infos will be exchanged between the diffrent client sides (web dashboard & desktop app)
# Authentication
This API must implement bearer/token authentication. The bearer tokens will be in JWT (JSON Web Token) format.

post.description: This command will authentifate users and gave them an authentification token to access to the proctected routes.
This command will register a new user  accordance to the defined user model.

200.description: Successful store of the user in the database.

get.description: This command will return one user

put.description: This command will update an existing user

200.description: Successful update of the user in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one user by id from the database.

post.description: This command will register a new supervisor according to the supervisor model

200.description: Successful store of the supervisor in the database.

get.description: This command will return one supervisor

put.description: This command will update an existing supervisor

200.description: Successful update of the supervisor in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one supervisor by id from the database.

post.description: This command will register a new employee according to the employee model

200.description: Successful store of the employee in the database.

get.description: This command will return one employee

put.description: This command will update an existing employee

200.description: Successful update of the employee in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one employee by id from the database.

post.description: This command will add a new task category in the server database in accordance to the defined taskCategory model.

200.description: Successful store of the task category in the database.

get.description: This command will return task categories

get.summary: get one task category by id
get.description: This command will return one task category

put.description: This command will update an existing task category

200.description: Successful update of the task category in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one task category by id from the database.

post.description: This command will add a new task  in the server database in accordance to the defined Category model.

200.description: Successful store of the task in the database.

get.description: This command will return one task

put.description: This command will update an existing task

200.description: Successful update of the task in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one task by id from the database.

post.description: This command will add a new screenshot in the server database in accordance to the defined screenshot data model.

200.description: Successful store of the screenshot in the database.

get.description: This command will return one screenshot

get.summary: get one screenshots by task id
get.description: This command will return screenshots by task id

put.description: This command will update an existing screenshot

200.description: Successful update of the screenshot in the database.

delete.description: This command will delete one screenshot by id from the database.

post.description: This command will add a new timelog in the server database in accordance to the defined timelog data model.

200.description: Successful store of the timelog in the database.

get.summary: get one timelog by task id
get.description: This command will return one timelog

delete.description: This command will delete one timelog by id from the database.

User.description: This model define all users infos

Supervisor.description: This model define additional infos for users (supervisors)

Employee.description: This model define additional infos for users (employees)

TaskCategory.description: This model define the task category

description.example: You will test the authentification module

employee.description: the owner of the task (one employee)

Success.description: This model define all success response messages

internalServerError.description: an intern exception throwed by one intern module

Error.description: This model define all error response messages
